body:
No, since some of them are trying to use externals that we may need to
redirect.

On Wed, Apr 12, 2017 at 5:07 PM, Yang Gao <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> *@yang-g* commented on this pull request.
> ------------------------------
>
> In bazel/grpc_build_system.bzl
> <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/10621#discussion_r111287165>:
>
> > @@ -69,3 +69,22 @@ def grpc_proto_library(name, srcs = [], deps = [], well_known_protos = None,
>      use_external = use_external,
>    )
>
> +def grpc_cc_test(name, srcs = [], deps = [], external_deps = [], args = [], data = []):
>
> Can we live with plain cc_library for tests?
>
> â€”

Urgh, why is Jenkins finding errors that I can't reproduce locally ?
